TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StoryFragment extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.BlockElement>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class StoryFragment Implements IAddChild, IEnumerable(Of BlockElement)
type StoryFragment = class interface IAddChild interface seq<BlockElement> interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表 XPS 文件內完整或部分的劇本。

span.span: Represents all or part of a story within an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XPS 劇本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件是約略相當於報紙或雜誌中的本文。An XPS story in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document is roughly analogous to a story in a newspaper or magazine. 它是一段文字和圖形的內容，通常在單一主題中，在單一[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。It is a passage of text and graphic content, usually on a single topic, within a single [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 一般而言，它跨越多個頁面，但可能很短於資訊看板的頁面 — 經過 boxing 處理的劇本 — 在雜誌。Typically, it spans multiple pages, but it can be shorter than a page like a sidebar — boxed story — in a magazine. 本文也可以是像是繼續第 4 頁的封面頁報紙劇本不連續。A story can also be discontinuous like a front page newspaper story that is continued on page 4. 因此，給定的頁面可能會有一個以上的劇本及多個劇本的組件。Consequently, a given page can have more than one story and parts of more than one story. 在頁首或頁尾也是劇本的一種特殊的完全包含在單一頁面。A header or footer is also a special kind of story that is entirely contained on a single page. A代表所有或部分的劇本。A represents all or a portion of a story. 它可以永遠不會跨多個頁面上，但可以佔用整個頁面或分享其他片段中的頁面。It can never span more than one page, but it can occupy the whole of a page or share a page with other fragments. 劇本是否位於多個頁面上，其中每個頁面上的每個部分會是不同的片段。If a story is on more than one page, each part of it on each page is a separate fragment. 雖然劇本可以有不連續的片段的集合，但是沒有片段本身可以是不連續。Although stories can have discontinuous sets of fragments, no fragment can itself be discontinuous. 只有項目可以是父代。Only a element can be a parent of a . 位置內的項目表示如果本文包含在多個片段，而且如果其他片段之前設定，或依照目前的片段。The location of the elements within a indicates if the story is contained in multiple fragments, and if the additional fragments either precede or follow the current fragment. 當結束中間部分的結構化項目，例如``，然後[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件產生的應用程式必須在插入項目的適當的結束標記 (在此情況下``) 之前``標記，即使不過結構中的更新版本的片段正在繼續。When a ends in the middle of some structural element; say a ``, then [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document-producing applications must insert an appropriate end tag for the element (in this case ``) before the `` tag, even though the structure is being continued in a later fragment. (這是為了確保元素樹狀結構內是有效的 XML。)接續 story 片段的開頭必須中斷結構開頭的標記。(This is necessary to ensure that the element tree within the is valid XML.) The fragment that continues the story must begin with an opening tag for the interrupted structure. 中斷結構的整個樹狀結構必須視為相同的方式 （使用一個例外狀況下, 面討論）： 結束標記必須新增的每個不成對的開始標記，上述被中斷的位置。The entire tree of interrupted structures must be treated the same way (with one exception, discussed below): End tags must be added for every unmatched start tag above the point of interruption. 劇本中斷之後，隨即出現時，適用於例外狀況``標記，則產生的應用程式必須插入空的資料表資料格結構 (``) 在接續 story 片段中對應的時間點。The exception applies when the story interruption comes immediately after a `` tag, then the producing application must insert an empty table cell structure (``) at the corresponding point in the fragment that continues the story. 這是劇本的必要的因此，需要合併指定的所有片段的取用端應用程式可以使用簡單的演算法來執行這項操作。This is necessary so that consuming applications that need to merge all fragments of a given story can use a simple algorithm to do this. 例如，假設，應用程式想要新增到下列資料[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件：Assume, for example, that an application wanted to add the following material to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document: ``` ``` 如果分頁符號會強制結束片段後方``"SomeContent 」，應用程式必須建立分割，在下列範例所示：If a page break forces an end to the fragment just after the `` for "SomeContent", the application must create the split as shown in the following example: ``` ``` 讀取文件的應用程式可能需要合併此內容。An application that reads the document might need to merge this content. 考慮，例如，使用 XPS 檢視器**複製到剪貼簿全部的詳情**按鈕，或有**XPS for the Blind**劇本傳遞至語音合成器的應用程式。Consider, for example, an XPS viewer with a **Copy Whole Story to Clipboard** button; or an **XPS for the Blind** application that passed stories to a voice synthesizer. 閱讀文件的某些應用程式可能需要合併的 story 片段的子集。Some applications that read the document may need to merge a subset of the fragments of a story. 例如，複製到剪貼簿的整個段落 triple-按一下的功能需要進行合併，每當段落跨越分頁，因為這類段落會分割成兩個s。For example, a feature that copies a whole paragraph to the clipboard by triple-clicking it would need to do a merge whenever the paragraph spanned a page break, because such a paragraph would be split between two s. **若要合併使用此演算法：****To merge use this algorithm:** 1. 刪除``從第一個片段合併及刪除結尾``從第二個開始。Delete the `` from the end of the first fragment to be merged and delete the `` from the beginning of the second. 2. 如果最後一個結尾標記的第一個片段的第一個項目的開頭標記為相同類型的第二個片段 (而非``標記)，刪除兩者。If the last closing tag of the first fragment is of the same type as the first opening tag of the second fragment (and they are not `` tags), delete them both. 3. 重複步驟 2 中，在兩個片段之前*任一*這些狀態：Repeat step 2 until the two fragments are in *either* of these states: - 不再是片段的前置片段結尾的第一個開始標記的最後一個結束標記之間的型別相符項目。There is no longer a type match between the last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment. - 前置的最後一個結束標記片段結尾的片段的第一個開始標記都``標記。The last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment are both `` tags. 在上述範例中，如果空資料格未加入產生的應用程式，然後合併片段會產生的資料表，其第一個資料列必須只有一個資料格第一次包含這兩個而不是原始的 「 SomeContent"和"MoreContent 」 參考資料列兩個資料格之後，每個都包含單一的參考In the example above, if the empty cell had not been added by the producing application, then a merger of the fragments would produce a table whose first row had only one cell containing both the "SomeContent" and "MoreContent" references instead of the original first row with two cells, each containing a single reference 當合併整個本文時，此演算法應該重複屬於相同的 story 的每個後續片段。When the entire story is being merged, the algorithm should be repeated for each subsequent fragment that is part of the same story. 屬於一段故事的片段會編製索引``項目。The fragments that belong to a story are indexed in the `` element. 參閱 9.1.15[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]您可以在取得規格[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). 必須為給定的劇本的最後一個片段作為其最後一個子系的項目。The last fragment for a given story will have a element as its last child. ## Examples 下列範例所示``屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following example shows the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructStoryFragContent1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage1_structure.xaml#docstructstoryfragcontent1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的值包括 「 標頭 」，「 頁尾 」 和 「 內容 」。Possible values include "Header," "Footer," and "Content." 如需詳細資訊`FragmentType`的屬性``屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件時，請參閱的第 9 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格其中您可以在取得[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `FragmentType` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下列範例所示`FragmentType`的屬性``屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following example shows the `FragmentType` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的劇本的所有片段必須都有相同的值，這個屬性。All fragments of a given story must have the same value for this property. 它必須符合`StoryName`屬性的``項目。It must match the `StoryName` attribute of the `` element. 參閱 9.1.15[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]您可以在取得規格[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). 這個屬性可以是未指定，如果是頁首或頁尾。This property can be unspecified if is Header or Footer. ## Examples 下列範例所示`StoryName`的屬性``屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following example shows the `StoryName` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 將子物件加入至 。Adds a child object to the . 必須有至少一個子系子系只能是一種類型： ， ， ， ， ，和。There must be at least one child of the and the children can only be of these types: , , , , , and . A只能是第一個或最後一個子系。A can only be the first or last child of a .
